attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app took several days to download. this is app made me hate my life i think it should be taken down i literally looked like 👁👄👁 THIS whole waiting for it to download it wasted my time. in my experience it’s really bad i don’t want anyone to download it so yeah❤️

attributes.title: 💫This app is atrocious💫🙈
attributes.review:
This app glitches every time I open it, and I’ve had friends with the same problem too. Instead of getting to jump on subways and out run pigs, it asks me to support Donald Trumps campaign?!??🤮🤮🤮
0/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: don’t
attributes.review: this is the worst app in the WORLD. i DO NOT recommended to download this app,it is so traumatizing to see this on my phone. i had such a bad experience with the app and will NEVER EVEN WANT TO LOOK AT IT AGAIN. please save yourself and don’t get the app!no seriously don’t get it!fr don’t get it!like fr fr don’t !

attributes.title: DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK !!!
attributes.review: it deleted all the apps on my phone and was about to restart it, all my photos are now gone and i’m furious it was like it was threatening me to get it or he would leak my information i wish i could give it 0 starts really, do better😤

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP 🧚🏽
attributes.review: this app is a big waste of time. before i got this app my phone was really good but then after i got this app my phone is VERY slow. everything is delayed and my phone is crap now. DONT GET THIS APP. if you wanna keep up with trump i suggest doing it another way. again DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.userName: THIS APP BELONGS IN THE TRASH

attributes.title: The worst!!!
attributes.review: This app is the possible worst thing you could ever put on your phone, the download took forever. When I was able to finally open the app it was so laggy and nothing made sense on there.

attributes.title: Nearly died 🤮
attributes.review: wish i could give this horrible app 0 stars!! took forever to download and my phone instantly broke when i opened it! The app store should really take this off bc i don’t want anyone else getting hurt

attributes.title: Spare the agony
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately lost all sense of smell in my left nostril. And then I opened the app and the pictures they had up there made me wish I was blind. I threw up on my phone and had to wash it and put it in rice. Spare yourself the agony and don’t download it

attributes.title: Garbage🤮
attributes.review: I’m gonna keep this professional and say the app is terrible it’s useless and let me tell you I took days to download like this app is for supporters but like I think I’m gonna have to switch up my vote because of this useless terrible app🤡

attributes.title: I GOT HACKED!!
attributes.review: Don’t download!! I got it expecting to have amazing  updates on our president but as soon as I did my phone got BOMBARDED with pictures of emmit from the LEGO movie! I don’t understand what kind of game people think this is!! This is an absolute disgrace... so disappointed 💔😔😭💔😔😭💔😔😭💔😔😭💔😭😔😭👹😏💘🤮😄🤮🤮😊💔🤣😅😁✨😅😄😄💀😃🤮💀💔🙃✨😅☺️
